description: This league is in Old City and plays at Washingtion Park which is located at the corner of Chestnut St and S 5th st.
This league is north of Center City, located in the Brewery District. The field is located at Fitler Park on NW 23rd st.
This league is played at Cooper River Park, located in Center City. The park enterance is on the corner of Pine st and Walnut st.
This league plays at Rittenhouse Square, located south of Center City. Rittenhouse Square is between South st and Broad st.
